Jail for 501 after Porsche 911 stolen from Parnell home before Waikato Expressway police pursuit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jail-for-501-after-porsche-911-stolen-from-parnell-home-before-waikato-expressway-police-pursuit/Z4H4DKYBABE55AVJ4GMTRI6K6I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/jail-for-501-after-porsche-911-stolen-from-parnell-home-before-waikato-expressway-police-pursuit/Z4H4DKYBABE55AVJ4GMTRI6K6I/ Cherie HowiePinched Porsche 911 eventually recovered after dramatic wrong-way police pursuit. Sat, 18 Jan 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Ronald Neilson was sentenced in Auckland District Court on Thursday for a series of crimes, including his part in stealing a Porsche and Land Rover from a Parnell, Auckland home, and a subsequent police pursuit on the Waikato Expressway.
